year.description: The year in which the delay happened

month.description: The month in which the delay happened

airport_name.description: The airport name in which the delay happened

airport_code.description: The airport code in which the delay happened

number_of_flights.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified

number_of_late_flights_by_fifteen_minute.description: The number arriving flight which were late by 15 minutes on the month specified

number_of_delayed_flights_with_carrier_d.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified which were late due to carrier delays

number_of_delayed_flights_with_weather_d.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified which were late due to weather delays

number_of_delayed_flights_with_national_.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified which were late due to NAS delays

number_of_delayed_flights_with_security_.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified which were late due to security delays

number_of_delayed_flights_with_late_airc.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified which were late due to late aircraft arrival delays

arrival_delay_time.description: The total number of time in minutes that aircraft were late
